ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 32
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe this is a boat bug, if you stand on the top level of the boat, you freeze up, loose all your hotkeys, and get to start up again on the boat, on the
ygData.messageBody:
I believe this is a boat bug, if you stand on the top level of the boat, you
freeze up, loose all your hotkeys, and get to start up again
on the boat, on the way back to qeynos, i was told it is two bugs kind
of working together, one crash bug one bug nixes your hotkeys

Message: 4
Date: Mon, 31 May 1999 11:38:57 -0230
From: Magis <Magis@...>
Subject: Re: How to learn a language

Tom Matthews wrote:

>From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
>
>And I have done it with four languages that way, about one complete cycle,
>you
teach on one side, zone, I teach, zone back takes a little over 3 mins and
we
only go up 2 points, you throw in interuptions, etc. and the fact some
people
take 50 seconds
>to zone then you get 4 hours, we dont all have cable modems you know.
>Not everyone zones in 15 seconds, ok.
>

OH God do I know .. Somehow My character is bugged.. My Zone time's are
Horror
able, I mean Usually have time to go get a coffee, have A BR Break come Sit
down , Roll a cig , and then i'm through, And to make the the best part .. I
can't go back to
Erudin without going in shame, ( Bare assed Naked) No equipment , no spells
on
me , the only thing i have on me Are my lore items That's it .. Otherwise I
crash , with All my Hot keys and Menus Reset , I manage to log in When the
Boats Back in Erudin
Crossing , headed to Qeynos, I've reported this bug and heave tried in a
while
though ...
